name: Hug-Out
description:
Controls :
  • Left - Dodge Left
  • Right - Dodge Right
  • Down - Block
  • Up - Step In
  • Space - Hug
  • F11 - Show Debug
  • F5 - Restart Game

Drain your opponent's anger by hugging him.

To hug, Step In then press The Hug Button.

Stepping in is dangerous and causes you to take more damage from attacks.

Unfinished prototype project based on an idea by ponjworld.com

programming, art, music by me.
